rooms.description: Large living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on the east-facing wall to maximize natural light, aligning with Vastu principles for energy flow.
Adjacent to living room, featuring a glass partition that connects the space while maintaining openness; includes eco-friendly lighting and ventilation.
Master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows on the south wall for optimal sunlight, incorporating energy-efficient design and natural ventilation.
Secondary bedroom positioned in the north part of the house to adhere to Vastu guidelines, with eco-friendly materials and ample lighting.
Functional kitchen designed for efficient workflow and energy-saving appliances, with natural light entering from the east side and a dedicated ventilation system.
Cozy home theater area with soundproofing and eco-friendly LED lighting, situated in the west section of the floor plan to avoid direct sunlight during viewing.
Primary bathroom attached to master bedroom with water-saving fixtures and proper ventilation.

openings.description: Main entrance door providing secure entry while allowing natural light; designed according to Vastu for positive energy flow.
Secondary exit door with ample space for outdoor connectivity and emergency egress, compliant with local safety norms.
Floor-to-ceiling window offering unobstructed views and natural light, enhancing energy efficiency.
